abstract.text: Provides animatable properties of an object conforming to

inlineContent.text: For easier access of a animatable property, you can extend the object’s PropertyAnimator.
To integralize a value  to the screen’s pixel boundaries when animating, use
.  This helps prevent drawing frames between pixels, causing aliasing issues. Note: Enabling it effectively quantizes values, so don’t use this for values that are supposed to be continuous.
